title: Magnificent!
text: I will always be coming back! I absolutely adore The Great Wall! Mutianyu passage is spectacular! Recommended!

title: Lovely!
text: Gorgeous park, beautiful view on top, i really enjoyed it, rocommended! And the entrance is like 2 yuan.

title: Fantastic!
text: Absolutely gorgeous! And obviously a must-see! I stayed there for hours! Fantastic view! HK rocks

title: Very nice!
text: Very traditional, sends tou back in time. Calm and tranquil. I really enjoyed it. Recommended to everyone who appreciates chinese cultural heritage.
place: Chen Clan Ancestral Hall-Folk Craft Museum

title: Fantastic!
text: Fantastic views! An absolute must see! I enjoyed it utterly. Take the taxi to the entrance with the funicular and use it! Makes everything much easier and more enjoyable x

title: Lovely!
text: Everyone should visit Acropolis while in Athens. It is just a must. Make sure it is a sunny day as well. Wear something confortable, particularly shoes. Enjoy!

title: Amazing!
text: What an awesome place! So much history and heritage. I absolutely loved being on top next to the famous Parthenon. Incredible feeling. Recommended!

title: Fantastic place!
text: We absolutely loved George's restaurant! Lovely service, beautiful place and view, amazing owner! The food was spot on! Highly recommended! Anna and Matthew x

title: Lovely place!
text: A wonderdul place! Very cute, great music, really good cocktails, nice view and amazing owners! We really enjoyed it! Highly recommeded! Anna and Matthew x

title: Wonderful place!
text: A wonderdul place! Very cute, great food, lovely service and amazing owners! We really enjoyed it! Highly recommeded! Anna and Matthew x

title: Very good!
text: A wonderdul place! Very cute, great music, really good food, nice view! We really enjoyed it! Highly recommeded!

title: Lovely!
text: A wonderful place! Lovely place, wonderful food, nice view and amazing owners! We really enjoyed it! Highly recommeded! Anna and Matthew x

title: Wonderful!
text: A wonderdul place! Very cute, great music, really good food, nice view and amazing owner! We really enjoyed it! Thank you! Highly recommeded! Anna and Matthew x

title: Fantastic!
text: We absolutely loved it! Fantastic hotel and brilliant location! We definitely will be back! One of the best in Cyprus! It has everything you need and you wouldn't want to leave :) Very recommended!!!!

title: Wonderful!
text: Amazing wines, wonderful hosts, beautiful place. We really enjoyed our visit to Ayia Mavri winery. Very recommended.

title: Love it!
text: One of my favourite places in Limassol. Amazing food, great selection of wine, brilliant service and awesome location!

title: Wonderful!
text: One of my favourite restaurants in Cyprus! Amazing food and atmosphere, wonderful service and brilliant chef! X

title: Nice beach, great for watching kitesurfing.
text: They do nice coffee and tea. We didn't try the food so I can't comment on that. It was very busy at the time we arrived. Watching people kitesurfing was awesome!

title: Nice, lots of place to eat out.
text: It's a nice place with lots of boats and little coffee places, very clean and tidy. Boat lovers should visit.

title: Lovely!
text: I love Limassol Promenade. Always buzzy. Big boats, limassol coastline, piers, coffee shops, beautiful views - a very nice place to visit.

title: Wonderful!
text: Nicolaides winery produces amazing wine, we really enjoyed the experience! The location is gorgeous. Recommended!

title: Gorgeous!
text: A beautiful place, takes you back in time, and still operating, such a shame no one is taking care of it..

title: Beautiful!
text: We were there right after the rain and it looked fantastic! A beautiful place, gorgeous seaviews, recommended!

title: Was very disappointing this time...
text:
Now we have moved to Cyprus, we decided to come back for a pint after having a great visit in July this year.. No one wanted to serve us this time.. Never mind serving, they didn't even awknoledge us. We were refused to be served cos we sat at the wrong table even though the waiter gave us a sign to sit anywhere we wanted from the other side of the yard not even bothering to come over.. Once they eventually took our order (when we moved tables and tried to order at the bar which they refused to do either), it took them another ten minutes to serve us until I actually asked them to pour us our drinks. Took us probably over 30 minutes to just get our pints... And we were in hurry... Very poor customer service. I felt stupid while sitting there. Will not come back.

P. S. To be fair the beer we ordered was nice so they get "poor" overall from me.

title: Beautiful!
text: A very beautiful place, recommended. Make sure you are a confisent driver and have a four by four to get there though. Overall, a great experience ;)

title: Very nice, will eat there again!
text: Very nice food, great service, nice location, we went there twice and were not disappointed! Recommended!

title: Great!
text: Quite authentic and delicious food, great atmosphere, decent service! We really enjoyed it and will come back! Recommended!

title: Very nice!
text: Not sure why people think it is a weird place but we thought it was great! Amazing beers! We didn't expect them to have such great variety, even Belgium beer that we love. Service was great so overall a very pleasant experience in both branches of Limassol! Recommended.

title: Wonderful!
text: A wonderfl place, lovely service, a huge variety of all sorts of cakes and bread, great quality and always delicious coffee! Love it! Recommended!

title: Beautiful views!
text: A very nice place, gorgeous views and a very nice service. We only had a pint but we really enjoyed it and will come back. Recommended.

title: We love it there!
text: We love the beach and the bar on the seafront! Wonderful service! We have never eaten in the actual restaurant but the bar service has always been brilliant! Recommended!

title: Wonderful!
text: We stayed in Pentakomo last July and we reaaally enjoyed it and eating at the Iris Tavern! A wonderful owner and an entertaining host! Great food amd atmosphere, very authentic! We will definitely come back! Recommended!

title: Awesome!!
text: Highly recommend, very well done, we enjoyed it a lot, our host was wonderful, a great gift idea! Thank you!

title: Very nice :)
text: Very nice, we have enjoyed it a lot, great food, cosy and warm, thank you for a lovely evening!!! xx

title: A very beautiful view!
text: We have really enjoyed the view and our beers in The smugglers Rest, decided not to order the food since the wait would have been mentally long.. so they told us :) And they only had one guy behind the bar on a busy and sunny Sunday afternoon so it took forever to get a drink... Overall, very nice. The view made it a lovely experience :)

title: The best burgers in Brighton!
text: Honestly, the best burgers in Brighton and Hove! Good value for the money and great service! Highly recommend to all the burger lovers!

title: AWESOME :)
text: Thank you Jamie!! Wonderful trip! Me and my partner enjoyed it immensely!!! Recommend to everyone xx

title: Lovely :)
text: Very cosy, sweet and lovely! Food is good and service is fast, we really really enjoyed coming here while staying in Inca!

title: Wonderful!!
text:
Wonderful place, brilliant location, gorgeous views, awesome owners and great experience!! I absolutely enjoyed my stay on Skye partially because we chose to stay in Gleann an Ronnaich Bed & Breakfast :)

Anna xx
